trans-unit.source: Provides data for the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> class is used to supply event values to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom Windows identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>類別用來提供事件的值給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，並讓您指定自訂的 Windows 身分識別目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件提供給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件時，才驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode.Windows>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity object.
trans-unit.target: Windows 識別物件。

trans-unit.source: The context for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> 類別的新建立執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 目前 HTTP 要求的 <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContext" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> provides access to <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>, <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> objects for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>提供存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A>， <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Response%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>目前要求的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Windows identity passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> 建構函式的 Windows 識別。

trans-unit.source: The Windows identity passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs" /> 建構函式的 Windows 識別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> constructs a <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object using the Windows identity supplied by IIS and the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and passes it to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>建構<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件使用 IIS 和目前所提供的 Windows 識別<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>並將其傳遞給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與目前要求相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> object to be associated with the current request.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前要求相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性來設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。
